title: Still confused by NFTs? Here’s what you need to know
description:
NFTs, or non-fungible tokens, are... complicated. That's why we have Sheila Warren, head of blockchain and data policy and member of the Executive Committee at the World Economic Forum, to help us break down.
Sheila will walk us through all the basics: What is an NFT? What exactly do you own when you buy an NFT? Is it a good investment?
